name: WAIFU
description: Waifu is a meme coin on the base chain set up by a doxxed youtuber called Crypto Senpai (https://www.youtube.com/@cryptosenpaii) Our aim is to bridge the gap between the anime community and the crypto world, onboarding new users into the exciting realm of digital currencies. Waifu is the term for a fictional character, usually in anime or related media, that someone has great, and sometimes romantic, affection for.
